fr.sii.ogham.email.builder

Class SendGridBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sii.ogham.email.builder.SendGridBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Builder<SendGridSender>

    public final class SendGridBuilder
extends Object
implements Builder<SendGridSender>
    Builder for the SendGrid-backed sender. It can only build instances using default parameters.

    • Method Detail

      • useDefaults

        public SendGridBuilder useDefaults()
        Tells the builder to use all default behaviors and values:
        • Use the system properties for credentials
        • Register Mime Type detection using MimeMagic library
        • Register default Mime Type (text/plain)
        • Handle MultiContent
        • Handle StringContent
        Returns:
        this instance for fluent use

      • useDefaults

        public SendGridBuilder useDefaults(Properties props)
        Tells the builder to use all default behaviors and values:
        • Use the provided properties for credentials
        • Register Mime Type detection using MimeMagic library
        • Register default Mime Type (text/plain)
        • Handle MultiContent
        • Handle StringContent
        Parameters:
        props - the properties to use
        Returns:
        this instance for fluent use

      • registerMimeTypeProvider

        public SendGridBuilder registerMimeTypeProvider(MimeTypeProvider provider)

        Register a new Mime Type provider. Registering several providers allows to try detecting using the first one. If it can't detect the mimetype, it tries with the next one until one detects successfully the Mime Type.

        The provider is added at the end so any previously registered provider that is able to provide a Mime Type prevents to use this provider.

        Parameters:
        provider - the provider to register
        Returns:
        this instance for fluent use

      • registerContentHandler

        public SendGridBuilder registerContentHandler(Class<? extends Content> clazz,
                                              SendGridContentHandler handler)
        Register a new handler for a specific content.
        Parameters:
        clazz - the class of the content to handle
        handler - the handler
        Returns:
        this instance for fluent use

        public SendGridBuilder withCredentials(String username,
                                       String password)
        Configures the builder to create senders that connect to SendGrid using the provided credentials.
        Parameters:
        username - the SendGrid username
        password - the SendGrid password
        Returns:
        the current instance for fluent use
